Jalapeño.desc: The Jalapeño difficulty introduces beginner programming concepts to build a solid foundation for more difficult problems later on.

Hungarian.desc: The easier half of technical interviews will have a problem from this difficulty. The algorithms and data structures used here are more complex than those in Jalapeño problems.

Habenero.desc: The harder half of technical interviews will have a problem from this difficulty. Oftentimes based on the same principles from the Hungarian difficulty but with a complex twist.

Ghost.desc: Insanely diffcult programming problems that are not seen in regular software engineering interviews.
